## DEM


```{r}
library(lidR)

mof <- readLAS("../data/lidar/lidar_2018_clipped.las")
dem <- grid_terrain(mof, res = 1, algorithm = tin())
plot(dem)
```

## DSM

```{r}
dsm <- grid_canopy(mof, res = 1, algorithm = dsmtin())
plot(dsm)
```

## CHM

```{r}
chm = dsm - dem
plot(chm)
```
